Hi thanks for the upload! but is this game full English?
How can I extract this flt files so can I find the ISO?

When I mount the image with daemon tools, all 4 gigs of memory go from free to standby memory and there are about 3000 hard faults per sec (page file use). Autorun is off. Once I open disk and run setup, all of the physical memory gets used up and the system basically freezes. I'm running Windows 7 64x
Awesome adventure thanks a lot FLT and @MAFIAA.
